item.title: 英国银行连续六周向英国央行申请创纪录现金
item.description: 英国银行扩大了对英格兰银行现金的创纪录申购，以补充因政策制定者继续出售多年来通过量化宽松政策获得的债券而流失的流动性。【原文：UK banks extended their record bid for cash from the Bank of England, replacing liquidity which is being drained as policymakers continue to sell bonds acquired through years of quantitative easing.】

item.title: 欧盟同意从 7 月起提高俄罗斯谷物进口关税
item.description: 欧盟同意提高进口俄罗斯谷物的关税，以遏制克里姆林宫的收入，并防止这些货物破坏该地区农业部门的稳定。【原文：The European Union agreed to hike tariffs on imports of Russian grain to curb the Kremlin’s revenues and prevent those shipments from destabilizing the region’s farm sector.】

item.title: 国内生产总值和通胀数据公布前，国债在大跌后保持稳定
item.description: 由于投资者在等待美国经济增长和通胀数据对经济状况做出更多说明，周四国债全线上涨，缩减了本周的大幅跌幅。【原文：Treasuries gained across the curve on Thursday, trimming this week’s sharp losses as investors waited for US growth and inflation data to shed more light on the state of the economy.】

item.title: Cevian 创始人称瑞士资本要求损害瑞银稳定性
item.description: 瑞银集团的一位主要激进投资者表示，瑞士提出的大幅提高瑞银集团资本要求的建议将对该银行的稳定和国家利益产生反作用。【原文：Switzerland’s proposal to significantly increase capital requirements for UBS Group AG will be counterproductive for the bank’s stability and the country’s interests, according to a major activist investor in the bank.】

item.title: 欧元区经济信心增强，复苏势头加强
item.description: 随着欧元区从去年下半年的温和衰退中反弹，该地区的经济信心有所增强。【原文：Euro-area economic confidence improved as the region bounces back from its mild recession in the second half of last year.】

item.title: 高盛称买入标榜创新的欧洲医药股
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：European drugmakers that are focused on building portfolios of new medicines have gotten a nod from analysts at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 德国将于 2025 年取消备受争议的天然气存储税
item.description: 德国将从明年 1 月起取消在其边境征收天然气储存税，因为捷克共和国等中欧国家表示，这将损害它们为摆脱俄罗斯天然气所做的努力。【原文：Germany will scrap a gas storage levy at its border from next January after central European states like the Czech Republic said it would harm their efforts to ditch Russian gas.】

item.title: 交易员正准备迎接将蹂躏大宗商品的创纪录盛夏
item.description:
食品和能源价格居高不下，令美联储抗击通胀的努力受挫。【原文：

High prices for food and energy frustrate the Federal Reserve’s inflation fight.

】

item.title: 现代电网的大问题
item.description:
以及我们是如何到达这里的。【原文：

And how we got here.

】

item.title: 非洲开发银行称，东非经济反弹将引领非洲大陆 2024 年的增长
item.description: 根据非洲开发银行的预测，东非将在今明两年反弹成为非洲大陆增长最快的地区。【原文：East Africa will bounce back to be the continent’s fastest growing region this year and next, according to the African Development Bank’s projections.】

item.title: 中国房地产和科技股跌至熊市里程碑
item.description: 中国的科技股和地产股正处于技术性调整的边缘，使人们对中国股市近期反弹的可持续性产生怀疑。【原文：China’s technology and property shares are on the brink of a technical correction, raising doubts over the sustainability of a recent rebound in the country’s equities.】

item.title: 日本为开发澳大利亚天然气项目提供 10 亿美元贷款
item.description: 日本将向伍德赛德能源集团有限公司（Woodside Energy Group Ltd.）提供 10 亿美元贷款，用于在澳大利亚开发天然气项目，这是亚洲能源进口国为确保数十年化石燃料供应而采取的又一举措。【原文：Japan will provide Woodside Energy Group Ltd. a $1 billion loan to develop a natural gas project in Australia, another move by the Asian energy importer to ensure the supply of fossil fuel for decades.】

item.title: 炙热气温促进印度天然气使用，闲置工厂重新启动
item.description: 据印度首都的一家主要燃料供应商称，由于一些闲置的发电厂重新启动以满足日益增长的电力需求，闷热的天气使印度的天然气需求比一年前增加了多达 12%。【原文：Sweltering heat has raised gas demand in India by as much as 12% from a year ago as some idle power plants have restarted to cater to growing electricity needs, according to a major supplier of the fuel in India’s capital.】

item.title: 中国万科与银行就 69 亿美元贷款进行深入谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国万科集团有限公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：China Vanke Co., the Chinese state-backed developer that’s become the latest flashpoint in the nation’s property crisis, is in advanced talks with major banks for a loan of about 50 billion yuan ($6.9 billion), people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 日本 30 年期债券与掉期利率差扩大至 2012 年以来最大值
item.description: 日本利率上升的另一个迹象是，30 年期政府债券收益率与掉期合约之间的差距扩大到了十多年来的最大值。【原文：In another sign of rising interest rates in Japan, the gap between 30-year government bond yields and swaps contracts has widened to the most in a more than a decade.】

item.title: 马克-莫比乌斯在近期反弹中转而看好中国股市
item.description: 马克-莫比斯（Mark Mobius）表示，中国股市 "看起来不错"，最近的反弹释放出信心信号，这与他在四月份呼吁投资者回避中国股市的观点正好相反。【原文：Mark Mobius said Chinese shares are “looking good” as the recent rebound signals confidence, reversing a call he made in April for investors to avoid them.】

item.title: 能源援助结束，西班牙通胀率连续第三个月加速上升
item.description: 西班牙通胀率连续第三个月加速上升，原因是政府为遏制能源危机而收回的支持继续推高物价。【原文：Spanish inflation quickened for a third month as the rollback of government support to contain energy crisis continued to push prices higher.】

item.title: 瑞士服务业和消费者意外保持增长步伐
item.description: 年初，瑞士经济出人意料地保持了服务业和私人消费的增长势头，但对出口商陷入困境的担忧依然存在。【原文：Switzerland’s economy unexpectedly maintained momentum at the start of the year on services and private consumption, while concerns about struggling exporters persist.】

item.title: 巴克莱发现 IPO 干涸期即将结束的迹象
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）有迹象表明，长达数年的首次公开募股（IPO）荒正在慢慢结束，因为企业负责人和投资者都对中央银行的降息计划有了更清晰的认识。【原文：Barclays Plc is seeing signs that the yearslong drought in IPOs is slowly coming to an end as corporate chiefs and investors alike have gotten more clarity on central banks’ plans to lower interest rates.】

item.title: 大选预测显示非国大衰落，南非兰特下跌
item.description: 南非兰特周四下跌，因为对大选的初步预测显示，执政党非洲人国民大会的支持率明显下降。【原文：South Africa’s rand fell Thursday as initial forecasts for the general election showed a marked decline in support for the ruling African National Congress.】

item.title: 苏纳克称保守党大选获胜将导致英国降息
item.description: 里希-苏纳克声称，在英国大选中投票支持其执政的保守党就是投票支持降息，这将英国央行卷入了一场它一直试图避免的运动。【原文：Rishi Sunak has claimed that a vote for his governing Conservative Party at the UK general election is a vote for interest rate cuts, drawing the Bank of England into a campaign it has been trying to avoid.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚大学伊藤称日本央行可能在 2024 年再加息两次
item.description: 哥伦比亚大学教授伊藤隆敏（Takatoshi Ito）认为，日本央行今年可能会再加息两次，但应避免直接应对日元疲软。【原文：The Bank of Japan may raise interest rates two more times this year, but it should refrain from responding directly to the weak yen, according to Takatoshi Ito, a professor at Columbia University.】

item.title: 运动鞋制造商金鹅计划在米兰上市
item.description: 金鹅（Golden Goose）将在米兰首次公开发行 1 亿欧元（1.08 亿美元）的股票，这家意大利奢侈运动鞋品牌旨在加强其资本结构并减少债务。【原文：Golden Goose is launching a primary offering of €100 million ($108 million) in an initial public offering in Milan as the Italian luxury sneaker brand aims to strengthen its capital structure and reduce debt.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数连跌第七天
item.description: 伦敦城。摄影师：Mike Kemp/Getty Images【原文：The City of London. Photographer: Mike Kemp/Getty Images】

item.title: 迪拜不再只是中转枢纽，寻求更多回头客
item.description: 迪拜希望增加航空运力，并将重点从作为中转枢纽和短期目的地转移到方便往返旅行的新签证上，以吸引更多游客。【原文：Dubai is looking to add more airline capacity and is betting on a new visa that facilitates return trips to attract more visitors, as it shifts its focus from serving as a transfer hub and short-term destination.】

item.title: 前欧洲央行副行长称瑞士 "大而不能倒 "计划存在缺陷
item.description: 一位全球金融规则的主要制定者表示，瑞士对瑞银集团这样的全球系统性银行进行清盘的方法具有一些特点，可能会在未来假想的危机中加剧动荡。【原文：Switzerland’s approach to winding down a globally-systemic bank such as UBS Group AG has features which could worsen the turmoil in a hypothetical future crisis, according to a key architect of global financial rules.】

item.title: 研究警告：美国银行存在商业地产盲点风险
item.description: 一项新的研究显示，由于向房地产投资信托基金提供信贷额度和定期贷款，美国大型银行对商业地产的风险敞口可能超过监管机构的预期。【原文：Large US banks may be more exposed to commercial property than regulators appreciate because of credit lines and term loans they provide to real estate investment trusts, according to a new study.】

item.title: 香格里拉酒店集团将首次出售 10 亿元熊猫债券
item.description: 豪华酒店运营商香格里拉亚洲有限公司（Shangri-La Asia Ltd.）首次涉足中国在岸债券市场，因为利率分化使得人民币借款比以其他主要货币计价的债务便宜得多。【原文：Luxury hotel operator Shangri-La Asia Ltd. is tapping the onshore Chinese bond market for the first time, as diverging interest rates have made yuan borrowings significantly cheaper than debt denominated in other major currencies.】

item.title: 竞购盎格鲁集团失败后，股东称赞必和必拓的纪律性
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group）老板迈克-亨利（Mike Henry）周三放弃了收购规模较小的竞争对手英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的大胆出价，这让急于证明该矿商不会不惜一切代价追求交易的投资者们欢欣鼓舞。【原文：Unable to press his target to the negotiating table, BHP Group boss Mike Henry on Wednesday walked away from a bold bid to buy smaller rival Anglo American Plc, cheering investors eager to see proof the miner will not pursue deals at any cost.】

item.title: 国际米兰曾是亿万富翁的玩物，后来钱花光了
item.description:
意大利最伟大的足球队之一刚刚赢得了第 20 个联赛冠军，但在董事会中却鲜有欢呼声。【原文：

One of Italy’s greatest football teams has just won its 20th league title, but in the boardroom there’s been little to cheer. 

】
